remarks: If an real number modulo a positive real number equals the positive real number decreased by 1, the real number increased by 1 modulo the positive real number equals 0.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2018.)
statement: modm1p1mod0 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) = ( M - 1 ) -> ( ( A + 1 ) mod M ) = 0 ) ) $.
